body_html:
I have a similar problem on Arch Linux, too.
Running

bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --verbose_failures //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

This error occurs

ERROR: /home/test/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:213:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '//tensorflow/core:gpu_runtime':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device_factory.cc':
  '/opt/cuda/include/cuda_runtime.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/host_config.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/builtin_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/device_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/host_defines.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/driver_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/surface_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/texture_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/vector_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/channel_descriptor.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/cuda_runtime_api.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/cuda_device_runtime_api.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/driver_functions.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/vector_functions.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/vector_functions.hpp'.
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build

Is there yet any solutions?

body:
I have a similar problem on Arch Linux, too.
Running

```
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda --verbose_failures //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
```

This error occurs

```
ERROR: /home/test/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:213:1: undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '//tensorflow/core:gpu_runtime':
this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device_factory.cc':
  '/opt/cuda/include/cuda_runtime.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/host_config.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/builtin_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/device_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/host_defines.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/driver_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/surface_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/texture_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/vector_types.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/channel_descriptor.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/cuda_runtime_api.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/cuda_device_runtime_api.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/driver_functions.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/vector_functions.h'
  '/opt/cuda/include/vector_functions.hpp'.
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
```

Is there yet any solutions?
